content.rendered:
Tandem.
The double
dating app

Only 50,000
spaces available.

Coming summer 24!!

Scroll to find out more
×

Just add your number to join the waitlist.

We’ll send you a text with your invite to the app. Excited to see you on Tandem xx

Get offered one month free premium when you join the waitlist We’ll send you a text with your invite to the app. Excited to see you on Tandem xx
×

Get 1 month free premium worth £20!

Just share us to two people and we’ll text you a free premium code.

All members must be 18+. By sharing you agree to our terms and conditions.
I don’t want free sh*t

Woohoo you’re in

We’ll text you when we are about to go live.
See you soon xxx

Donzo

Premium Plan

Unlock all Tandems premium features when we go live.

Whats included:

  • Unlimited Likes

    Send as many likes as you want

  • View all your Likes

    See everyone thats liked your profile

  • Unlimited Undo

    Dont miss a match again

  • Get Read Reciepts

    See who has read your messages

  • Priority Likes

    Your likes will go toward the top.

Premium value of £19.99 p/m

Create a
joint profile

Match
other duos

Group chat
together

So, what
actually is
Tandem?

Tandem is a double dating app. Designed to bring the fun back to online dating.

You make a joint profile with your friend and match with other duos to go out on double dates. It’s that simple.

Tandem is brimming with features to make dating fun, secure, and stress-free.

Find out more

No more first
date anxiety

Goodbye to the
talking stage

Safer dating
with a friend

Goodbye to the
talking stage

Joint profiles
together

Always have
your wingman

Dates are more
fun as a four

Always have
your wingman

Why should
you join our
waitlist?

The first release of the app will be limited to 50,000 spaces which are going fast. To ensure your spot on the app join the waitlist now, it only takes a couple seconds.

You can also get free premium for a month when we launch worth £20. Not bad for under 1 minutes work…

Get free Premium

Get 1 month free premium worth £20!

Just share us to two people and we’ll text you a free premium code.

All members must be 18+. By sharing you agree to our terms and conditions.

You’ve got Premium

We’ll text you your premium code when we are about to go live. See you soon xxx.

Donzo
Join The Waitlist
